definition: to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: In other words, it wreaks havoc on our memory.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，它对我们的记忆力造成了严重的破坏。

sentences.english: In other words, this is an example of good and bad prejudice, right?
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，这个例子里有好先见和坏先见，是吧？

sentences.english: Or in other words, nature precedes art.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，自然先于艺术。

sentences.english: In other words polarization properties are excluded.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，偏振性质未包括在内。

sentences.english: In other words, "human and animal burials" will be banned.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，“人畜合葬”将被禁止。

sentences.english: In other words, look at the entire life cyle.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，要考虑到整个生命周期。

sentences.english: In other words, ageing is not only stoppable but also reversible.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说就是衰老不仅可以阻止，而且可以逆转。

sentences.english: He suggests shading plants with bed sheets, shade cloth or brush -- in other words, sticks and branches.
sentences.chinese: 或者用灌木丛，换句话说，也就是枝条。

sentences.english: T Namely dS is greater than dq over T.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说就是dS大于dq除以。

sentences.english: In other words, long-dated bonds offer a lot more income than short ones.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，长期债券的收益要高于短期债券。

sentences.english: In another word, the range of relating right shall not be unreasonably extended.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，邻接权的范围不得被不合理的扩大。

sentences.english: In other words: one must not inconsiderately pester the cause of desire.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，我们一定不要冒失地骚扰这个欲望的原因。

sentences.english: In other words, they don't shy away from it.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，他们从不对其避而不谈。

sentences.english: In other words, it's force per unit area.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，这就是单位面积上的受力。

sentences.english: In other words, those secure systems can be very easily brute forced.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，这些安全体系可能很容易被暴力破解。

sentences.english: I'm a student of the world; in other words I flunked out of high school.
sentences.chinese: 我是社会学生，换句话说，我高中后就辍学了。
